tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "3B7924704C7B30B9878082943AEC1DF0", "Mayors can initiate limited number of special Mayoral Commissions with unique rewards. If enough players contribute, the Commission will yield valuable Node upgrades and improvements.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "A41764004F3ED450955158ABFDD66031", "Select from a daily rotating list of possible Mayoral Commissions. There are only a certain number of slots available, so choose wisely!")
